items.title: CFA® Level 1 (2021/2022) - Complete Equity Investments

visible_instructors.title: PrepNuggets | by Keith Tan, CFA
visible_instructors.name: PrepNuggets
visible_instructors.job_title: #1 Complete CFA® Level I Prep Provider!

items.headline: Deep dive into Equity Investments with the Bestselling CFA® prep course provider | With visual learning + Quizzes
objectives_summary: You will learn about financial markets and intermediaries, trading positions, placement and processing of orders, primary vs secondary markets.
You will learn how to calculate the price return and total return of an index, how indexes are constructed and managed, and use of market indexes.
You will learn the definitions of market efficiency, the efficient market hypothesis, what are market anomalies, and be introduced to behavioural finance.

items.title: Budgeting for Business
items.headline: Learn how to create and use budgets effectively in company large or small.
objectives_summary: Be able to use the budgeting process to increase teamwork, planning, and control where you work or in your own business.
Be able to apply the budgeting process to improve organizational performance.
Be able to speak confidently on the key concepts of the budgeting process including who, what, when, where, and why do a budget.

items.title: Personal Finance: Financial Security Thinking & Principles
items.headline: How to secure your financial future the fun & easy way! Personal Finance: Financial Security Thinking & Principles
objectives_summary: How your mind keeps you from having better control over your finances
The time-tested wealth principles that the financially successful use
How to reduce spending without reducing fun

Capital and Types of Capital: Equity & Debt
Financial Instruments: Shares and Bonds

items.title: Finance for Non Finance Executives
items.headline: Accounting and Finance Fundamentals for Non Finance Executives
objectives_summary: Understand why accounts are prepared?
Understand what is Financial Management and how it is different from Accounting?
Understand What are Financial Statements and how it is useful for Decision Making?

objectives_summary: You will learn the features of hedge funds, private equity, real estate, commodities, and infrastructure investments.
You will understand the fee structures for hedge funds and PE funds.
You will learn the potential benefits of alternative investments in the context of portfolio management.

items.title: The Role and Goal of Financial Management
items.headline: Introduce yourself with the world of finance, the areas of financial decision-making and plan your learning of finance.
objectives_summary: Define finance
Recognize the specific areas of business finance
Identify the role, tasks, scope, and challenges of a financial manager

items.title: The Ultimate Guide to Financial Freedom with Dividends
items.headline: Achieve Financial Freedom with this Step-by-Step Guide Every Beginner Can Follow. Requires Only 1-2 hours/week.
objectives_summary: Learn the differences between trading and investing.
Identify top quality companies by using simple filtering criteria.
Examine the safety of the dividend.

items.title: Complete 2-in-1 Python for Business and Finance Bootcamp
items.headline: Data Science, Statistics, Hypothesis Tests, Regression, Simulations for Business & Finance: Python Coding AND Theory A-Z
objectives_summary: Learn Python coding from Zero in a Business, Finance & Data Science context (real Examples)
Learn Business & Finance (Time Value of Money, Capital Budgeting, Risk, Return & Correlation)
Learn Statistics (descriptive & inferential, Probability Distributions, Confidence Intervals, Hypothesis Testing)
